channel.title: Posts on Peter's weblog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Peter's weblog

item.title: Boris Johnson’s Great Brexit Miscalculation
item.description: Yesterday we told you that British politics were in a state of chaos. That hasn’t changed. Prime Minister Boris Johnson’s own brother this morning resigned both from parliament and from the Conservative Party and Johnson again was defeated in a procedural vote last night. It appears that there will be new elections, but nobody knows when. And it also appears that, in the event of those new elections, not much will change.

item.title: Keiser Report - Food vouchers for peasants (E1432)
item.description: Food vouchers for peasants (E1432) In this episode of the Keiser Report, Max and Stacy discuss Foodbank South Australia which is now creating a new project aimed at subsidizing clients with vouchers funded by the major bank to buy basic needs — in order to avoid any defaulting mortgage payments. In the second half, Max interviews Mark Valek, the author of the ‘In Gold We Trust’ report, about the roles of gold and bitcoin in times when a “social contract” does not work anymore.
